name: Bloodmare
description:
In Bloodmare you fight against hordes of enemies without  any weapon.  You can perform a push attack to knockback little enemies and to modify the enemy fireball's direction. You also can lift up little enemies and yourself with a magic trap. Try to bounce fireballs and keep defeating enemies until you die. 

Controls: 

W/A/S/D - Move
Left Mouse - Push
Right Mouse - Place magic trap

Made by:

Edgar Payán - Artist
Oscar Sastre - Programmer
Marc Torres Martínez - Designer
Eduard Tubert - Programmer

Project created during the degree in Videogame Design and Production by Tecnocampus Mataró.
